entry.tran: 同船的船员;同船的水手
entry.def: Sailors who work together on the same ship are shipmates .

example.ex: His shipmates stayed at their stations.
example.tran: 他同船的水手都在坚守岗位。

means.word_mean: 1. an associate on the same ship with you
